programme.title: Liverpool vs. Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Liverpool are winless in six Premier League matches against Arsenal, their longest winless run against the Gunners since going eight without a win between October 2007 and April 2011. The last three Premier League games between Liverpool and Arsenal at Anfield have all been drawn, while the Gunners are winless in their last 12 away games against the Reds since a 2-0 win back in September 2012, with manager Mikel Arteta starting for the Gunners that day.

programme.title: Chelsea vs. Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Chelsea have lost just 8.3% of their Premier League games against Fulham, the joint-lowest loss rate one side has against another with a minimum of 20 meetings. Fulham won this exact fixture 2-1 last season, ending a 21-game winless streak away to Chelsea in all competitions. They’ve never won consecutive visits to Stamford Bridge in their history.

programme.title: Main Race - F1 Italian Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: beIN SPORTS is the live and exclusive broadcast partners of Formula 1 until end of 2033 season. The 2025 season has a record schedule of 24 Formula 1 races and all race weekends, including every Practice, Qualifying, Sprint and Race will be live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Newcastle United have gone 17 Premier League matches without a win against Liverpool since winning 2-0 back in December 2015 under Steve McClaren. In their league history, they’ve had longer winless runs against Man City and Man Utd. Liverpool have won five of their last seven away Premier League games against Newcastle and have gone 1-0 down in each of their last two visits to St James’ Park before recovering to win and draw.

programme.title: Germany vs Northern Ireland - UEFA European Qualifiers World Cup 2026 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Northern Ireland have lost each of their last nine meetings with Germany in all competitions; only against England and Scotland have they ever lost 10+ successive meetings with any side. Germany are looking to win 10+ consecutive meetings with a single nation for the third time, after an ongoing run of 12 against Albania and a run of 13 against Finland from 1925 to 1989.

programme.title: Serbia vs England - UEFA European Qualifiers World Cup 2026 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Including Yugoslavia and Serbia and Montenegro, England have won each of their last five meetings with Serbia by an aggregate score of 11-3. This will be England’s first visit to Serbia as an independent nation, with their last away game against Yugoslavia coming in November 1987, winning 4-1 in a UEFA European Championship qualifier.

programme.title: Armenia vs Rep Ireland - UEFA European Qualifiers World Cup 2026 - MD6
programme.desc: Republic of Ireland have won three of their four internationals against Armenia, although the exception was their last away from home, losing 1-0 in the UEFA Nations League in June 2022. The last meeting between Armenia and Republic of Ireland saw the Boys in Green win 3-2 in the UEFA Nations League in September 2022. The five goals in that match were as many as there were in the first three matches between the two nations combined beforehand.

programme.title: UEFA UCL Magazine 2025/2026-Play-off Review / USC Review / Draw Review
programme.desc: Luis Enrique and Ousmane Dembele, the key figures behind PSG’s triumph, look back on their landmark achievement of winning Europe’s ultimate club prize. The episode also unveils a cinematic journey through Udine, the host city of the 50th UEFA Super Cup, while capturing all the headlines from the 2025/26 UEFA Champions League League Phase draw. Among the season’s historic moments is Cypriot side Pafos making their debut in the competition, alongside three other newcomers. Finally, Brazilian legend Kaká reflects on his enduring bond with the Champions League trophy, which he famously lifted with AC Milan in 2007.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 3
programme.desc: Between 2017-18 and 2023-24, Brighton and Hove Albion only avoided defeat in two of 14 Premier League games against Man City ; last season, they didn’t lose against City, winning 2-1 at home and drawing 2-2 at the Etihad. Manchester City have won 19 out of 30 league matches against Brighton – among the 46 teams they’ve faced 25+ times, the only side they have a higher win ratio against is Swansea City.

programme.title: Olympique Lyonnais vs Olympique Marseille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 3
programme.desc: Lyon and Marseille will face each other for the 126th time in all competitions, with OM becoming the second most often faced opponent by OL. It will be only their ninth meeting in August, the first since 2005. Lyon have lost five of their last six matches against Marseille in Ligue 1, only one defeat less than in the first 42 meetings between these two teams in the top-flight in the 21st century.

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 3
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano have lost their last three LaLiga games against Barcelona, ​​all three since Iñigo Perez’s arrival, after scoring and being unbeaten in each of their previous five against the Catalans in the competition. Barcelona have only won one of their last four LaLiga away games against Rayo Vallecano, after winning their previous six away games against them in the top-flight.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Mallorca - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 3
programme.desc: Real Madrid have dropped points in two of their last five LaLiga games against Mallorca, having won nine of their previous 10 against the Balearic team in the competition. At home, Real Madrid have won each of their last nine LaLiga games against Mallorca, scoring an average of three goals per game, since a 1-3 defeat in May 2009 under Juande Ramos and Gregorio Manzano as Mallorca boss. This is their longest winning streak at home against them in the top-flight.

programme.desc: This will be the first encounter between Kawasaki Frontale and Al Sadd in the AFC Champions League Elite, and the first match for Al Sadd against a Japanese team and for Kawasaki against a Qatari team in the competition. This is their first match against an East Asian team since the 2011 final.

programme.title: Gemma TRIAY PONS ESP Delfina BREA SENESI ARG vs Claudia FERNANDEZ SANCHEZ ESP Beatriz GONZALEZ FERNA
programme.desc: The spotlight falls on Madrid for the P1 women’s doubles final of Premier Padel 2025. Spain’s Gemma Triay and Argentina’s Delfina Brea, one of the most established partnerships on tour, face the rising Spanish duo Claudia Fernandez and Beatriz Gonzalez. It’s a battle of proven champions against fearless challengers, with local fans eager to witness if youthful ambition can overcome seasoned excellence in this prestigious title match.

programme.title: Arturo COELLO ESP Agustin TAPIA ARG vs Martin DI NENNO ARG Leandro ROMAN AUGSBURGUER ARG - Men’s Fin
programme.desc: Madrid sets the stage for a thrilling men’s final at the 2025 Premier Padel P1. Top seeds Arturo Coello and Agustín Tapia, the reigning powerhouse duo blending Spanish flair with Argentine precision, take on the all-Argentine pair Martín Di Nenno and Leandro Augsburger. A clash of styles is guaranteed: Coello’s dominance at the net and Tapia’s explosive creativity tested by Di Nenno’s defensive wizardry and Augsburger’s fearless power. The ultimate battle for the P1 crown.

programme.title: Canada vs USA - 3rd Place - 2025 FIBA AmeriCup
programme.desc: Bronze is on the line after a quick turnaround. The USA are record AmeriCup winners with seven titles, while Canada are chasing a statement podium. The senior series favors the USA 21–2, although the most recent major clash flipped the script: Canada beat the USA 127–118 after overtime for 2023 World Cup bronze in Manila. Their last AmeriCup meeting was the 2022 bronze game, which the USA won 84–80. Current FIBA Men’s World Ranking: USA No. 1, Canada No. 6. Bench depth, defensive rebounding, and three-point efficiency are likely to separate them.

programme.title: Argentina vs Brazil - Final - 2025 FIBA AmeriCup
programme.desc: South America’s classic rivalry decides the AmeriCup. Argentina are the reigning champions with three titles (2001, 2011, 2022), while Brazil are four-time winners (1984, 1988, 2005, 2009). Argentina lead the senior head-to-head 25–17. Their last AmeriCup meeting was the 2022 final in Recife, which Argentina won 75–73; at the 2019 World Cup second round, Argentina won 87–73. Current FIBA Men’s World Ranking: Argentina No. 8, Brazil No. 12. Expect a tactical game where turnover margin, second-chance points, and late free throws decide it.

programme.title: Novak Djokovic - The dream of a lifetime
programme.desc: Discover the remarkable journey of Novak Djokovic, the 7-year-old boy who dreamed of Wimbledon amidst the turmoil of Belgrade... and went on to conquer it 7 times. beIN SPORTS presents an exclusive 85-minute documentary that explores the dream that became a reality.

programme.title: Aryna Sabalenka vs Amanda Anisimova - Women’s Singles Final - Arthur Ashe Court - Tennis US Open 202
programme.desc: World No. 1 and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka returns to Arthur Ashe Stadium aiming for her fourth Grand Slam crown and successive US Open titles. Across the net, Amanda Anisimova reaches her first New York final after stunning Iga Świątek and Naomi Osaka. The American leads their rivalry 6–3, adding intrigue to a high-stakes clash. Victory would place the winner among the defining stories of the 125th US Open.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner vs Carlos Alcaraz - Men’s Singles Final - Arthur Ashe Court - Tennis US Open 2025
programme.desc: Two young giants renew one of tennis’s fiercest rivalries. Alcaraz, already a two-time Grand Slam champion and former US Open winner, leads their head-to-head by a slim margin. Sinner, the 2024 Australian Open champion, seeks to level the balance. A clash of power, speed, and mental edge with the title in New York on the line.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 3 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester United have lost just one of their last 25 home games against Burnley in all competitions, going down 2-0 in January 2020. Of all teams to have visited Manchester United at least eight times in the Premier League, Burnley are one of three teams to have avoided defeat in more than half, along with Chelsea and Manchester City.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/26 - Edwin Van Der Sar
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 3 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Between 2017-18 and 2023-24, Brighton and Hove Albion only avoided defeat in two of 14 Premier League games against Man City ; last season, they didn’t lose against City, winning 2-1 at home and drawing 2-2 at the Etihad. Manchester City have won 19 out of 30 league matches against Brighton – among the 46 teams they’ve faced 25+ times, the only side they have a higher win ratio against is Swansea City.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 3 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool are winless in six Premier League matches against Arsenal, their longest winless run against the Gunners since going eight without a win between October 2007 and April 2011. The last three Premier League games between Liverpool and Arsenal at Anfield have all been drawn, while the Gunners are winless in their last 12 away games against the Reds since a 2-0 win back in September 2012, with manager Mikel Arteta starting for the Gunners that day.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport - Sawm
programme.desc: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab. Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan.

programme.title: West Ham vs Wolverhampton - Coupe de la Ligue Anglaise - J02 - Football 2025-2026
programme.desc: Sport, Sport, Football. Quatre-vingt-douze clubs anglais, issus de la Premier League et de lEFL, saffrontent dans ce tournoi intense. Chaque tour elimine des equipes, et cest en finale que se decidera le champion.

programme.title: Hawaien - Bein Story - Magazine 2024-2025

programme.title: Al Rayyan vs Al Duhail - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W3
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. programme.title: Montpellier vs Dijon - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Equestrian Longines Global Champions Tour - Valkenswaard Netherlands - Jumping Day 1
programme.desc: Valkenswaard, home to the Tops International Arena, hosts one of the most prestigious stops on the Longines Global Champions Tour. The world’s best show jumpers and horses compete in a setting famed for its world-class facilities, electric atmosphere, and technical courses that test precision, timing, and partnership.

programme.title: Qatar Prix de lArc de Triomphe 2024 Highlight
